tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE protein_expression (
  protein_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  protein_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  expression_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
  condition_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (condition_id) REFERENCES experimental_conditions(condition_id)
);

CREATE TABLE protein_expression (
    protein_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    condition_id INT,
    protein_name VARCHAR(255),
    expression_level DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (condition_id) REFERENCES experimental_conditions (condition_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experimental_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    condition_id INT,
    protein_id INT,
    result_date DATE,
    measurement_type VARCHAR(50),
    result_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (condition_id) REFERENCES experimental_conditions (condition_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (protein_id) REFERENCES protein_expression (protein_id)
);

CREATE TABLE protein_expression (
    protein_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    protein_name VARCHAR(50),
    expression_level FLOAT,
    condition_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (condition_id) REFERENCES experimental_conditions(condition_id)
);

CREATE TABLE treatment_results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    condition_id INT,
    protein_id INT,
    result_value FLOAT,
    result_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (condition_id) REFERENCES experimental_conditions(condition_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (protein_id) REFERENCES protein_expression(protein_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(50),
    researcher_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);
